summary: A dedicated Geologist with over 11 years of diverse experience in Reservoir Geology and Geomodelling in a different parts of the world including: North Sea, Holland, Algeria, Sudan, Egypet, Naigeria, Congo and Vietnam. Have strong Geomodelling capabilities and sound knowledge of drilling operations, Well log interpretation and Operation Geology. Good organizational, interpersonal and excellent presentation skills. Currently working as part of multidisciplinary team as Reservoir Geologist/ Geomodeller. My current roles include: to perform reservoir geological modeling work by conducting a systematic and an integrated reservoir study using sedimentology, seismic information and petrophysical data to define reservoir architecture, properties distribution, and heterogeneities. The models will be used to provide reliable resource assessments and input to reservoir simulation to optimize recovery.

position_groups:
[{'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'SGS Horizon B.V', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'The Hague Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'SGS Horizon B.V', 'description': '•	Defined volume to calculate STOOIP, GIIP and Recoverable Hydrocarbon Reserves using petrel and PET software. 
•	Stratigraphic tops picking/identification, field scale correlations and construction of static geologic, stratigraphic and structural models used in exploration and development projects.
•	Built comprehensive static 3D reservoir models, which incorporates structural, sedimentary facies and properties of reservoir rock for geological evaluation and up-scaled models for engineering simulations. 
•	Incorporated sedimentological interpretations, petrophysical data and seismic attributes results into reservoir models.
•	Interpreted geological data together with other G&G professionals and cooperated closely with reservoir engineers to ensure robust dynamic reservoir models.', 'title': 'Reservoir Geologist - Geomodeller', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'SOC', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'company': 'SOC', 'description': "•	Provided well data analysis, formation tops identification, field scale correlations and construction of geologic, stratigraphic and structural models used in exploration and development projects.
•	Built comprehensive 3D reservoir models (for more than 12 fields), which incorporated structural, sedimentary facies and reservoir properties for geological evaluation and up-scaled models for engineering simulations.
•	Contributed in geological models for Fractured Basement reservoirs as part of Sudan fractured basement team.
•	Incorporated sedimentological interpretations, petrophysical data and seismic attributes results into reservoir models.
•	Provided geologic support for well placement, production monitoring and workovers.
•	Assessment of hydrocarbon resources for several exploratory Blocks and fields.
•	Worked closely with reservoir engineers to ensure proper up-scaled dynamic reservoir models.
•	Quality controlled and reviewed existing reservoir geological models and updated several static models as new well data became available.
•	Prepared comprehensive geologic reports and presentations.
•	Reviewed and analyzed operators' geological data and prepared recommendations/proposals for drilling development and infill wells.
•	Represented the company in technical meetings, conferences and peer reviews with shareholders, government and contractors.
•	Trained junior geologists in various aspects of geology and geomodeling.", 'title': 'Reservoir Geologist/ Geomodeller', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'PetroDar operating company (PDOC)', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}}, 'company': 'PetroDar operating company (PDOC)', 'description': '(Consortium of CNPC /Petronas/ Sinopec & Sudapet)        SOC Seconded     

•	Participated in well operations, particularly with respect to activities related to geology and Petrophysics such as cuttings and core description, well-logging  and petrophysical evaluation 
•	Provided integrated geological data analysis and interpretation such as Geological log interpretation, well correlations, pick stratigraphic units boundaries and mapping.
•	Followed and QC-ed drilling operation and monitor closely the progress in the drilling from geological point of view in terms of formation penetration and reservoir units at well site.
•	Participated in prospects and field evaluation process, including risking and volumetric estimates.
•	Participated in data preparations for Exploration Technical Review Meetings.', 'title': 'Geologist', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'OEPA', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}}, 'company': 'OEPA', 'description': '•	Participated in drilling, geology and well testing operations.
•	Participated in geological lab analysis: Sedimentology, Paleontology, Geochemistry and Core descriptions.
•	Participated in technical meetings and peer reviews.
•	Prepared preliminary recommendations for approval or denial of drilling proposals.
•	Data compilation and ensured the quality of the geological data for Ministry of Petroleum database.', 'title': 'Trainee Geologist', 'employment_type': None}]}]
